summary: This is an email chain regarding a federal trial subpoena. A Special Agent from the FBI's New York Field Office (Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking) sends a trial subpoena to an individual, who responds confirming they have requested time off from work and will provide updates.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Sends a trial subpoena to an individual from the FBI New York Field Office, Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force.

persons.name: Des
persons.context: Recipient of the federal trial subpoena who responds to the FBI agent, indicating they have requested time off from work to comply.

connections.description: The Special Agent is serving a federal trial subpoena to Des, who is arranging to take time off work in response.

events.title: Trial subpoena issued
events.description: A federal trial subpoena is sent by an FBI Special Agent to an individual named Des.

events.title: Response to subpoena
events.description: Des responds to the FBI agent, confirming they have requested time off from work to comply with the subpoena and will provide updates.

keyFacts: A federal trial subpoena was issued on November 15, 2021, by an FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force.
The subpoena recipient, Des, confirmed on November 16, 2021, that they had requested time off from work to comply and would provide updates.
The communication indicates an ongoing federal trial related to child exploitation or human trafficking, likely connected to the Epstein case.
